_comment: Git Integration Configuration Template for SDD Toolkit
_description: Copy this file to git_config.json and customize as needed. This file documents all available git integration settings.
_enabled_description: Master switch for git integration. Set to true to enable automatic git operations. Default: false (disabled for safety)
_auto_branch_description: Automatically create feature branches when starting work on a spec. Branch name format: 'feat/{spec-id}'. Default: true
_auto_commit_description: Automatically commit changes when completing tasks. Commit message includes task ID and description. Default: true
_auto_push_description: Automatically push commits to remote repository. Requires user confirmation if false. Default: false (requires explicit push for safety)
_auto_pr_description: Automatically create pull requests when specs are completed. Requires gh CLI. Default: false (requires explicit PR creation)
_commit_cadence_description: When to create commits: 'task' (after each task), 'phase' (after each phase), 'manual' (user controls). Default: 'task'
